channel.title: kraft on Ed-M.dev
channel.description: Recent content in kraft on Ed-M.dev

item.description: 220601 Getting Kafka to some operational state So I got the KRaft to work I think, then I realized I really didn’t understand all that much about Kafka and using the new stuff leaves documentation rather low, but whatever.

220531 So I am starting with Choreography pattering so that means going with Kafka I have worked with MQ in the past but the future is now. So looking at the documentation for Kafka there is new feature that been in the tested in Kafka for a few years (since 2020) that removes the required zookeeper meta manager under the title KRaft
